page.title: 10YOUTH CLUBS
page.content: There are basically 2 youth clubs actually in the area. However there are others outside that can be used. The two in the area are situated within the town sections,ie. MARGAM YOUTH CLUB and TAIBACH YOUTH CLUB. They offer a wide variety of pastimes and have a fairly modest following. Several times throughout the year they hold disco's that can be attended by non-members. Such events are necessary for the financial upkeep of the clubs. Besides these there are also the normal cubs,scouts and guide groups also Boy's Brigade, athletics and a cycling club.
